CreatePost.title: Create New Post
CreatePost.subtitle: Create engaging and inspiring content for your audience
CreatePost.tip: Tip: Add a question or call to action
CreatePost.platform_format_hint: Enable a platform and pick formats to build variants.
CreatePost.variant_empty_hint: Add a platform format above to edit variant captions.
CreatePost.ai_brief_placeholder: Describe the post goal or audience
CreatePost.ai_review_note: Review suggestions for accuracy and spot any issues before publishing.
CreatePost.preview_empty: Add content to preview the post
CreatePost.preview_disclaimer: Previews are an approximation of how your post will look when published. The final post may look slightly different.
CreatePost.error_content_required: Please provide content and select at least one platform
CreatePost.error_not_logged_in: You must be logged in to create a post
CreatePost.error_no_accounts: No connected accounts found for selected platforms. Please connect accounts first.
CreatePost.error_create_failed: Failed to create posts for any brand. Please check your account connections.
CreatePost.schedule_hint: Posts will be published at the scheduled time
CreatePost.format_requires_media: This format requires media to be uploaded
CreatePost.format_requires_video: This format requires a video file
CreatePost.format_requires_min_media: This format requires at least {count} media item(s)
CreatePost.format_exceeds_max_media: This format supports up to {count} media items
CreatePost.format_requires_multiple_media: This format requires multiple media items
CreatePost.instagram_reel_requires_video: Instagram Reels require a video file
CreatePost.instagram_carousel_requires_multiple: Instagram Carousels require at least 2 images
CreatePost.instagram_carousel_max_10: Instagram Carousels support up to 10 images
CreatePost.tiktok_carousel_max_35: TikTok Carousels support up to 35 images
CreatePost.tiktok_carousel_no_mixing: TikTok Carousels cannot mix photos and videos
CreatePost.youtube_requires_video: YouTube posts require a video file

LinkedIn.title: Manage LinkedIn Account
LinkedIn.subtitle: Choose how you want to post
LinkedIn.choose_posting_type: Choose how you want to post
LinkedIn.url_label: LinkedIn Page URL or URN (Numeric ID Required):
LinkedIn.invalid_url: Invalid URL format. Please provide a URL with numeric ID or a URN.
LinkedIn.how_to_get_url: üìå How to get the correct URL:
LinkedIn.step_1: Navigate to your LinkedIn Company or Showcase Page
LinkedIn.step_2: Open the admin area; copy a URL that contains the NUMERIC ID
LinkedIn.step_3: Or paste a full URN like urn:li:organization:123 or urn:li:organizationBrand:456
LinkedIn.tip: üí° Enter your LinkedIn page URL or URN with numeric ID above
LinkedIn.missing_url: Please provide a LinkedIn organization URL or URN
LinkedIn.invalid_url_toast: LinkedIn organization URL must contain a numeric ID. Please check the URL format.
LinkedIn.company_name_hint: Enter the official name of the LinkedIn company page

Calendar.title: Calendar
Calendar.subtitle: Plan and schedule your content with important dates
Calendar.click_date_events: Click on a date to see events

Integrations.title: Connections
Integrations.subtitle: Manage your social media connections
Integrations.select_or_create_brand: Select a brand or create a new one
Integrations.no_brands: No brands. Create a new brand to get started.
Integrations.connect_accounts_description: Connect your social media accounts or enter account details manually.
Integrations.connect_demo_accounts: Connect demo accounts for testing or enter account details manually.
Integrations.disconnect_warning: This action will disconnect the account "{handle}" from the system.
Integrations.delete_brand_message: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This will also remove the associated profile and cannot be undone.
Integrations.connection_cancelled: Connection cancelled. The account was not connected.
Integrations.connection_error: Failed to connect account. Please try again.
Integrations.sync_error_no_brand: No brand selected or brand not linked to Getlate profile
Integrations.sync_success_description: Accounts synced successfully. Follower counts updated.
Integrations.disconnect_getlate_error: Error disconnecting from Getlate. Account will be disconnected locally only.
Integrations.disconnect_getlate_warning: Account disconnected locally, but Getlate disconnect failed
Integrations.delete_brand_has_accounts: Please disconnect all connected accounts before deleting this brand.
Integrations.delete_brand_failed: Failed to delete brand. Please try again.
Integrations.brand_creation_error: Failed to create brand. Please try again.
Integrations.no_pages_available: No pages available. Please reconnect your Facebook account.
Integrations.no_organizations_available: No organizations available. Please reconnect your LinkedIn account.
Integrations.linkedin_personal_only: You can post as your personal account. No organizations available.
Integrations.select_posting_account: Select how you want to post:

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.subtitle: Manage your personal information and system preferences
Settings.appearance_desc: Customize the system's appearance to your liking
Settings.save_tip: Tip: Changes will be saved permanently and will apply to all your future logins

BrandSentiment.title: Brand Sentiment on Platform
BrandSentiment.subtitle: Analyze how your brand is perceived across the internet
BrandSentiment.settings_description: Enter keywords (comma-separated) for sentiment analysis for the brand "{brand}"
BrandSentiment.keywords_placeholder: For example: brand name, product name, campaign name...

Insights.title: Insights & Recommendations
Insights.subtitle: Get personalized recommendations to improve your content
Insights.timing_rec_1: Publish on Tuesdays and Wednesdays between 9:00-11:00 for maximum engagement
Insights.timing_rec_2: Weekends (Saturday-Sunday) are suitable for personal and inspiring content
Insights.timing_rec_3: Avoid publishing between 13:00-15:00 - busy hours with low engagement
Insights.content_rec_1: Create visual content with personal stories - increases engagement by 45%
Insights.content_rec_2: Add short tutorial videos (30-60 seconds) - popular format
Insights.content_rec_3: Share behind-the-scenes content for authentic connection with audience
Insights.keywords_rec_1: #ProfessionalTips #Inspiration #Entrepreneurship - the most popular hashtags in the field
Insights.keywords_rec_2: Use current trends but in a way relevant to your brand
Insights.keywords_rec_3: Create unique hashtags for your brand to build a community
Insights.strategy_rec_1: Develop a monthly content strategy with 70% original content, 30% shared content
Insights.strategy_rec_2: Build collaborations with influencers in your field
Insights.strategy_rec_3: Focus on building an active community rather than just growing follower count
Insights.performance_rec_1: Your posts receive higher engagement on Tuesdays and Wednesdays
Insights.performance_rec_2: Visual content receives 2x more engagement than textual content
Insights.trends_rec_1: Trend #AI is on the rise - consider incorporating it into your content
Insights.trends_rec_2: Behind-the-scenes content is very popular this week - take advantage of the opportunity

PostSentiment.title: Post Sentiment Analysis
PostSentiment.subtitle: Analyze comments and sentiment of your posts
PostSentiment.posts_description: Select a post to analyze comment sentiment

Inbox.title: Comments Center
Inbox.select_account: Select an account to view comments
Inbox.permissions_hint: Make sure your account has the required permissions
Inbox.will_get_back: I'll get back to you shortly.
Inbox.let_me_help: Let me help you with that.
